name: FAMILY AT WAR
description:
FAMILY AT WAR - Download Windows 64bit Free!

2D local multiplayer brawler up to 4 players

Play up to 2 players PvP using only one keyboard, or up to 4 players with gamepad or keyboard

3 classes of fighters Knight, Archer and Magician with different weapons and agility levels

85 levels with physics based destructible itens like crates, bombs, hay stacks...

in game power ups and traps
